#Determining what stations are used most frequently


#202301 frequency

```{r}


tripdata_202301 <- read.csv("202301-capitalbikeshare-tripdata.csv")
 tripdata_202301 %>%
   count(start_station_name, sort = TRUE)
 
```


#202302 frequency

